If some have problems to run TomTom:

A piece of advice: To get tomtom working if not running yet you must:
open metadata.xml in text editor and change the xxxxxxxxxxx (xx.. are numbers) to "0"
after that, you can delete uneeded languages from folder com.tomtom.europe/files/VautoTTS/languages/ leave just language what u need
You save arround 1GB!!!

Have fun :)

ScorpioPirate :)
